Room.Name: Orchard Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Orchard Lane, south of the Tranquility Patrol.
Room.LongDescription: The Tranquility Patrol Station is located on the north side of the road and provides peacekeeping support to the bars and nightclubs around the area. The Tranquility Patrol is dedicated to keeping order and peace. They wander around the streets and bars, breaking up fights and brawls.
